data.name: Meta Sudoku Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Meta Sudoku Soundtrack has a total of 17 songs including the theme song Meta Sudoku, they are quiet, elegant and relaxing, which will relieve your brain fatigue, relax your tense nerves, and add to your happiness experience!

Just like the names of these music, I hope you can also acquire these beautiful qualities, and find your true self in a busy and stressful life, do not lose hope when life is low, and most importantly, please chase a dream, That will make you more and more invincible !

Finally, I hope you enjoyed listening, super genius!

data.short_description: This is a simple and relaxing game to play, it is beneficial to activate your brain, strengthen logical thinking, improve inference ability and ability to capture details. It is also a good choice to play a game like this in your spare time! Have fun playing!
